Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

Thanks! LGTM
I think these should probably be `dom_smul` rather than `smul'`
done
This seems like it's in the wrong place; can't you put it near the other module instance on additive maps?
I have moved it to `Mathlib.Algebra.Module.Hom`, where another module instance of add monoid hom lives
I renamed these lemmas to match the 6 or so that we already have. If you're not a fan of them, then let's rename all of them at once.
Thanks, I like your version better

Oh, forgot to say, maybe
```suggestion
instance instDomMulActModule
```
is better
